summary:
Damage to player multiplied by 5
Damage to follower multiplied by 4
Damage from player multiplied by 0.2
Damage from follower multiplied by 0.5
NO enemies (including dragons) can use a kill move on the player

has optional file that stops anyone who is not the player from using kill moves.
descriptionHtml:
Added optional file that stops anyone who is not the player from using kill moves.

Damage to player multiplied by 5
Damage to follower multiplied by 4
Damage from player multiplied by 0.2
Damage from follower multiplied by 0.5

NO enemies (including dragons) can use a kill move on the player

.esp goes in skyrim data folder

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
OR
C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
author: qaz099

files.name: Only the player can use kill moves
files.fileName: Only the player can use kill moves-34663-1.zip
